title: ∙ Purchase of condoms from the father of history
subtitle: The young man discovers that the pharmacist he sold the condom is the father of his blind date.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: A young man with a blind appointment to be arranged later in the evening stops at a drug store one afternoon to take some condoms (if only). To cover his stress, he jokes with the pharmacist about how he intends to "get lucky" that night. When a young man arrives at his girlfriend's house later that evening, he answers the same pharmaceutical door, which is clearly the father of his blind companion.
